title: frankbitcoin
author: frankbitcoin
created_time: February 16, 2023, 11:08:30 PMLast edit: March 04, 2023, 11:51:27 PM by frankbitcoin
content: Hope you all are doing well.Going through some of my things and came across this that I had.  Only copy I have and decided I'd auction it off.When I purchased it several years ago, I thought it would be cool to accumulate some pieces from October 31st, 2008 - this is from The Times and includes the Certificate of Authenticity as well as the "Day To Remember" hard box.Auction Terms:Starting Bid:  .01Minimum Bid Increments:  .0005Shipping:  $20 US shipping or $40 International.  Will ship flat with tracking.Auction Ends:  Thursday, February 23rd, 6 PM ESTSniping:  No, any bid made during the last ten minutes of the auction will extend the auction an additional ten minutes until no further bids have been made.
